Live Show at Brooklyn Bridge Park

From the 5th to 8th of August

Located in a waterfront park along the East River in New York City.

Be ready to enjoy awesome movies with your friends and family

From 6pm to Midnight

At Brooklyn Outdoor Film Festival you will have the chance to see great movies from new release to classic,
and all shows will be for free.
